Keegan Evans

This page is very much a work in progress. The blog section is a bit of an overview of the things that I have been working on. I have several articles written but I have not gotten the page holding them worked out to my satisfication. Stylistically, it is a bit of a disaster, but at this point the site is for learning and so that I have a place to hold a record of my daily activities for myself. In this regard it has been successful.
